job title: User Experience Lead Membership Data Scientist
job description:
Nike's Membership Data Science is a growing organization responsible for building and deepening a holistic view of Nike's consumers through data and analytics and applying those insights to inform the development of incredible digital services, content and experiences for our consumers.

As our lead UX/Information Designer, you have a keen interest and abilities in several of the following: user research, IA, UX, UI, information design and visual design. Expertise in all these is not required, we are looking for a generalist with deep areas of expertise or interest. While we dont expect you to code, if you have the skills to put together interactive prototypes that are useful. Your ideal type of squad consists of developers and data scientists.
Qualifications
Education:
  • Bachelors or Background in a
    related field such as UX, IA, HCI, Communication Design, Fine Arts or a
    related field.
User Experience Design:
  • Lead all UX design projects for
    the product including wireframes/sketches, user personas and user journeys
  • Employ an iterative approach to
    design constantly refining and prototyping solutions based on user
    feedback and key usage metrics
  • Streamline workflows and visual
    elements to influence user behavior and interactivity.
  • Work closely with dev/date
    science teams and product manager to deliver on a consistent basis
  • Interest in continuous
    delivery, dual-track agile and prototyping
